title: <:diamond_shape:1013899470867537990> MVP
description:
The <@&1000878369514205285> role is given to those who **purchase 8 or more** products that are under the name of Returned Studios.

**Perks**
- Create private or public threads
- Ability to open video camera in voice chats
- Access to MVP discussion channels
- Access to MVP gated giveaways (Chance to receive products for **free**!)
- Access to Returned Forge server, where we test our beta products
